mapper.update: update request_info set request_status =#{status} where id =#{requestId}
mapper.select: SELECT mi.email_address,mi.name_zh,tid.start_date,tid.end_date,tid.except_finish_date,tid.bank_holiday_date FROM TIMESHEET_API.timesheet_info_detail AS tid LEFT JOIN PROFILE_API.member_info AS mi ON tid.member_id = mi.id WHERE tid.seq_id=#{seqId}

SELECT mi.id,mi.email_address,mi.name_zh,tid.start_date,tid.end_date,tid.bank_holiday_days,tid.act_work_days,tid.`annual_leaving_days`,tid.`sick_leaving_days`,tid.`bank_holiday_date`,bi.project_code,bi.proportion FROM TIMESHEET_API.timesheet_info_detail AS tid LEFT JOIN PROFILE_API.member_info AS mi ON tid.member_id = mi.id LEFT JOIN PROFILE_API.binding_info AS bi ON bi.member_id = mi.id WHERE tid.seq_id =#{seqId} ORDER BY ID DESC
